definitions.title: wall
definitions.body: (NH [[גׇּדֵר]], Aram. [[גׇּדֵירָא]], [[גְּדֵירָא]], Ar. jadrun, jidrun, and more commonly jida0run enclosing-wall cf. Heb. [[גְּדוֹר]] infr.)—abs. [[גׇּדֵר]] Nu 22:24, Nu 24:24 + 5 t. + Ps 62:4 (rd. [[גדרה]] cf. infr.) + Ez Eze 13:5 (Co [[גדרת]] cf. infr.); cstr. [[גׇּדֶר]] Pr 24:31, Ez Eze 42:10 (Co del.); sf. [[גְּדֵרוֹ]] Is 5:5, [[גְּדֵרָהּ]] Ho 2:8 (cf. Baer, note); pl. sf. [[גְּדֵרַיִךְ]] Mic 7:11, [[גּדֵרֶיהָ]] Ps 80:13; —wall, fence, bordering a road Nu 2:24, Nu 2:24 cf. Ec 10:8; connected with Ezekiel's temple Ez Eze 42:7; city wall Mic 7:11 cf. Ezr 9:9; fig. of Yahweh's vineyard Is 5:5, Ps 80:13; of fortunes of Israel Ez Eze 22:30; so also Ez Eze 13:5 (Co [[גְּדֶרֶת]] cf. [[גְּדֵרָה]]); of hindrance in path of Israel (fig. as woman) Ho 2:8; of man beset by enemies Ps 62:4 (´[[ג]] [[הַדְּחוּיׇה]], but rd. ´[[גְּדֵרָה ד]] Ol De etc.)
